name: Trim the sheeps !
description:
They look harmless but don't be fooled by their innocent looks! Their ultimate goal is to wool the World! Don't let them multiply or things could get out of control... 

Thrim the sheeps is a game where you control a croc whose mission in life is to prevent the sheeps from taking over the world. However, there is a twist. Your croc needs to nap from time to time...

Features:

  • Magnificent graphics. Just admire them :)
  • A nice croc that REALLY needs to nap.
  • Ninja sheeps that use smoke screens to appear from thin air.
  • Lot's of fun I hope.

Controls

  • Keyboard: WSAD or arrows to move around, escape to pause the game
  • Gamepad: right stick to move around, start to pause the game

Note:

I made the game alone (with some help from my wife) during the GMTK Game Jam 2020. Thanks to them for organising this event ! I hope you have fun !
